channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

item.title: Report X-2025010356
item.description:
Report X-2025010356

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-13T21:12:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-08
  • City: CONLEY
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ABF Operation Manager states that they were unloading trailer 500186 in dock door 138 when they found a hazmat pallet that was loaded on to one deck bar with one thin strap securing the load. ABF operation manager states when they took the strap off, a 1 gallon bottle of UN3264, CORROSIVE LIQUID ACI DIC INORGANIC N.O .S. (CONTAINSPHOSPHORIC ACID), 8, PG II fell off and spilled about 1 qt onto the trailer floor. ABF OM stated that the previous place that loaded the freight didn't load it correctly resulting in the spill.
